sources.name: Solar PV prices through time- ITRPV
sources.description:
Data published by International Technology Roadmap for Photovoltaic (ITRPV) 2016 Results
Link http://www.itrpv.net/Reports/Downloads/
Retrieved 2017-04-23

Prices provided as global average module price for photovoltaic cell in 2016 US$ per watt (W) output.
